## Procurement Spend Analyzer

Understanding your cost structure and optimization opportunities is the foundation of data-driven procurement. This calculator helps you model potential savings across three key procurement levers.

<div class="calculator-grid">
<div>
<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="currentSpend">Current Annual Spend</label>
<input type="number" id="currentSpend" placeholder="e.g., 10000000" value="10000000">
</div>

<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="consolidationSavings">Supplier Consolidation Opportunity (%)</label>
<input type="number" id="consolidationSavings" placeholder="e.g., 8" value="8" min="0" max="100">
<small>Typical range: 5-15% from eliminating tail spend and redundancy</small>
</div>

<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="negotiationSavings">Negotiation Opportunity (%)</label>
<input type="number" id="negotiationSavings" placeholder="e.g., 5" value="5" min="0" max="100">
<small>Typical range: 3-10% from renegotiating terms with key suppliers</small>
</div>

<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="processOptimization">Process Optimization Opportunity (%)</label>
<input type="number" id="processOptimization" placeholder="e.g., 4" value="4" min="0" max="100">
<small>Typical range: 2-8% from automation, better ordering, reduced waste</small>
</div>

<button class="calculator-button" onclick="calculateSavings()">Calculate Savings Opportunity</button>
</div>

<div class="calculator-results" id="resultsContainer" style="display: none;">
<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">Total Annual Savings</div>
<div class="result-value" id="totalSavings">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">From Supplier Consolidation</div>
<div class="result-value" id="consolidationAmount" style="color: #27ae60;">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">From Negotiation & Terms</div>
<div class="result-value" id="negotiationAmount" style="color: #27ae60;">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">From Process Optimization</div>
<div class="result-value" id="optimizationAmount" style="color: #27ae60;">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">New Optimized Spend</div>
<div class="result-value" id="newSpend">$0</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<script>
function calculateSavings() {
  const currentSpend = parseFloat(document.getElementById('currentSpend').value) || 0;
  const consolidation = parseFloat(document.getElementById('consolidationSavings').value) || 0;
  const negotiation = parseFloat(document.getElementById('negotiationSavings').value) || 0;
  const optimization = parseFloat(document.getElementById('processOptimization').value) || 0;
  
  const consolidationAmount = currentSpend * (consolidation / 100);
  const negotiationAmount = currentSpend * (negotiation / 100);
  const optimizationAmount = currentSpend * (optimization / 100);
  const totalSavings = consolidationAmount + negotiationAmount + optimizationAmount;
  const newSpend = currentSpend - totalSavings;
  
  document.getElementById('totalSavings').textContent = '$' + totalSavings.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('consolidationAmount').textContent = '$' + consolidationAmount.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('negotiationAmount').textContent = '$' + negotiationAmount.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('optimizationAmount').textContent = '$' + optimizationAmount.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('newSpend').textContent = '$' + newSpend.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  
  document.getElementById('resultsContainer').style.display = 'block';
}
</script>

</div>

<div class="tool-section">

## Supplier & Contract Management Assistant

Complex supplier relationships, contract negotiations, and compliance require structured thinking. This assistant helps your team work through procurement decisions systematically.

<div class="chatbot-grid">
<div>
<div class="chatbot-box">
<div class="chat-messages" id="chatMessages">
<div class="chat-message ai">Hi. I can help you think through contract terms, supplier risk, cost optimization strategies, compliance requirements, and strategic planning.

What would you like to work through?</div>
</div>
<div class="chat-input-area">
<input type="text" id="chatInput" placeholder="Ask about supplier strategy..." onkeypress="if(event.key==='Enter') sendMessage()">
<button onclick="sendMessage()">Send</button>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div>
<div class="chatbot-info">
<strong>How to Use This Assistant</strong>
<ul class="info-list">
<li><strong>Contract Analysis</strong> - Identify unfavorable terms, hidden costs, renewal obligations</li>
<li><strong>Supplier Risk</strong> - Assess financial stability, concentration risk, geopolitical exposure</li>
<li><strong>Negotiation Strategy</strong> - Identify leverage points, benchmark against market rates, find alternatives</li>
<li><strong>Cost Optimization</strong> - Model consolidation opportunities, renegotiation windows, alternative sourcing</li>
<li><strong>Compliance</strong> - Evaluate environmental standards, labor practices, regulatory requirements</li>
<li><strong>Supply Chain Planning</strong> - Develop dual-sourcing strategy, manage geographic risk, build resilience</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div style="margin-top: 1.5rem;">
<strong>Key Capabilities</strong>
<div class="feature-list">
<div class="feature-item">
<strong>Spend Pattern Analysis</strong>
<p>Identify optimization opportunities across your supplier base and spending categories</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-item">
<strong>Terms Assessment</strong>
<p>Review contract language and identify areas for renegotiation and improvement</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-item">
<strong>Risk Identification</strong>
<p>Spot supplier vulnerabilities and supply chain concentrations before they become problems</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-item">
<strong>Savings Modeling</strong>
<p>Quantify potential savings and build action plans for procurement initiatives</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<script>
const sampleResponses = {
  'contract': 'Key areas to evaluate in supplier contracts: (1) Payment terms—30/60/90 day net significantly impacts cash flow; (2) Renewal clauses—auto-renewal language can lock you in; (3) Price adjustment mechanisms—ensure you\'re protected against commodity price spikes; (4) Termination for convenience—can you exit without penalty; (5) Liability and SLA clauses—are you adequately protected?\n\nShare specific contract language and I can help you identify risks.',
  'supplier': 'Systematic supplier risk assessment covers: (1) Financial health—review recent financials and credit ratings; (2) Concentration—what percentage of your spend is with this supplier; (3) Geographic exposure—what geopolitical risks exist; (4) Alternative sources—can you switch suppliers if needed; (5) Service level compliance—are they meeting agreements.\n\nWhat supplier concerns do you want to evaluate?',
  'cost': 'Core cost optimization levers: (1) Consolidation—reduce fragmented spend across too many suppliers (typical 5-15% savings); (2) Negotiation—renegotiate with top suppliers using competitive bids (typical 3-10%); (3) Process improvement—automation, better forecasting, waste reduction (typical 2-8%); (4) Alternative sourcing—identify new suppliers or categories (typical 10-20%).\n\nUse the calculator above to model your opportunity.',
  'negotiate': 'Build procurement leverage through: (1) Data—use spend intelligence to show volume and multi-year commitment value; (2) Timing—renegotiate near renewal windows; (3) Alternatives—develop competitive bids from other suppliers; (4) Terms focus—negotiate payment terms, volumes, exclusivity, not just price; (5) Bundling—combine categories for better leverage.\n\nWhich category are you negotiating?',
  'default': 'I can help with contract analysis, supplier risk assessment, cost optimization, negotiation strategy, compliance review, and supply chain planning. What aspect would you like to work through?'
};

function sendMessage() {
  const input = document.getElementById('chatInput');
  const message = input.value.trim();
  
  if (!message) return;
  
  const messagesDiv = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
  const userMsg = document.createElement('div');
  userMsg.className = 'chat-message user';
  userMsg.textContent = message;
  messagesDiv.appendChild(userMsg);
  
  input.value = '';
  
  setTimeout(() => {
    const lowerMessage = message.toLowerCase();
    let response = sampleResponses['default'];
    
    if (lowerMessage.includes('contract') || lowerMessage.includes('terms')) {
      response = sampleResponses['contract'];
    } else if (lowerMessage.includes('supplier') || lowerMessage.includes('risk')) {
      response = sampleResponses['supplier'];
    } else if (lowerMessage.includes('cost') || lowerMessage.includes('saving')) {
      response = sampleResponses['cost'];
    } else if (lowerMessage.includes('negot') || lowerMessage.includes('leverage')) {
      response = sampleResponses['negotiate'];
    }
    
    const aiMsg = document.createElement('div');
    aiMsg.className = 'chat-message ai';
    aiMsg.textContent = response;
    messagesDiv.appendChild(aiMsg);
    messagesDiv.scrollTop = messagesDiv.scrollHeight;
  }, 500);
}
</script>
